phrases: Which will it be, as God in heaven says...
Love, dreams, yearning, do not let them stop.
The dazzling sun through the trees sparkles and dances in your eyes.
I want to gaze at you beside me always.
Come on, predict where we will be tomorrow.
Love, dreams, yearning, do not let them stop.
It is handy when you get a job, and it pays off a lot more than part-time work.
No, uh, I am not interested...
You should come see our Media Club, it is great.
Lots of our members end up in big-name media jobs.
We start off by playing tennis at Tateshina.
B-But did not you have short hair?
It is been years since then.
So, what were you listening to?
A CD by the voice actress Sumire Matsuzawa.
Why does he make harem anime?
His boss said at Animerama that... Manga Research Society
H-Hey, you are really interested in the Manga Club?
You used to have a telescope, Kohsaka.
But for now, I will try talking with the Manga Club.
What kinds of things does the Manga Club do here?
Well we have got more of a history than the Anime Club.
Unfortunately there are only a few of us now, but we used to have around fifty.
Oh, of course there is no hazing like in the physical clubs.
And we deal with the student council, but that is about it.
Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture
I have decided on my summer costume.
Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture
Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture
Y-You will make Miss President's helmet yourself?
Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture
As long as I use a German army one as a base.
T-The problem is how heavy it is.
In reality it will not be.
I-lf you make this, you should do it right.
The Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture P23
The Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture Room 304
The Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture
Are you one of the upperclassmen?
No, not yet, I thought I would come see...
This guy wants to check out the group.
Then today we are without our straight woman Kasukabe.
She is so good at it, though.
But it is not like she is joined yet.
Did you see the Kujiun opinion site?
Whatever they thought of it, there were a lot of screen captures.
T-There were already comments by French people.
Maybe it is not such a badly made show...
T-The scriptwriter Yokotari o-originally did Crusher.
Yeah, I think it is an adventure framework, like Tarurun Family was.
It has good points so will it be a good adventure or just go out on a limb?
I wonder which way Kujiun will go.
I-It said Muranaka on the original drawings.
It did not really seem to fit.
Did not he originally do action stuff?
N-No, lately he is been doing p-promotional cels and whatnot.
He is generally involved in Studio Pulp productions.
Maybe he gets used for convenience, since he seems speedy.
I still have not read this week's...
I am going to the bathroom.
Hey, the cooking match has started.
It is cool to show off, but that is pushing it.
To present a world view and developments to the viewer.
Does not that make it too hard to understand?
At first glance, you cannot tell if it is a romantic comedy or an action show.
The director spends some time making this fight the central point.
But to introduce Renko and Yamada, they had to have a fight.
That is Final Fantasy, but I am not sure which one...
Do not have too much fun.
S-Sorry, I have to do something.
S-Somebody should c-come back before long.
It is down to just us.
Well, the easygoing atmosphere seems to suit me.
Yeah, I am in the club office...
It is cool, just watch some Kujiun.
In a room like this, there is bound to be some erotic stuff...
I have wanted to, but I have never bought one...
A figure's just not the real thing if you cannot see panties.
Or maybe you have only seen them in model magazine photos?
Take a look out the window.
Do not sweat it, this happens every year.
T-They got me too last year.
Do I look like I am one of them?
That was not a hard question!
You are not really showing up at Genshiken.
It is not like I actually joined...
It do not really think it suits me.
You look like a perfect fit.
Well, maybe you are right then...
You do not really look that way.
I mean, you have got a girlfriend.
Well, that does not mean we are going out.
But, we are together a lot.
That is right, they are otaku.
but it does not feel like Tokyo with all those mountains!
It is the middle of nowhere!
There is not a single fun thing to do around there for a young couple.
Why do they spend so much time playing games?
We will go head to head.
Uh, I am sorry, I do not think I can win.
Let us call the club guys.
I think they are about as good at this as you.
Forget that, let us play some COF.
I do not have the system.
I think we should be able to.
K-Kohsaka, can I read some manga?
Pick the box lunch you want.
We will figure out the money later.
Get to know me, include me, fulfill me!
So I went to Harajuku today, and on the way home...
Can I come over right now?
Right, the Genshiken guys are here.
Do not worry, we are all leaving.
You can come over, it is all right!
Anyway, come over, we are leaving soon.
He must be the one I hit on impulse the other day...
It would be really messed up if I owed him for this.
You do not throw a mundane girlfriend into the same room as us.
W-We are the ones who get shafted.
S-She does not seem to be his girlfriend, yet.
Is not Kohsaka the only one who thinks that?
Um, I am sorry I said we were leaving.
It was the thing to do.
All right then, where should we go?
Does anyone have any adult video games?
Very well, let us go to Kugayama's place.
H-Hey, you mean no matter what?
What I am lacking is determination...
The determination to live the way I want...
We took no detours or shortcuts...
Only vivid dreams extended deep into the shadows.
We are not quite grown up.
Simple but complicated glistening like marbles.
The time we could see from there sparkled, even if nothing big happened.
What we see from the marbles in our hands now is a little different...
I am going to try this on, then.
I really mean it, do not.
Animation comes from the Latin anima.
In other words, its word root means the soul.
Animism is the ideal from the 19th century anthropologist Tylor's...
Animation is therefore what gives movement to still pictures...
Namely, the power of the gods!
